description: The classic story of the Little Red Hen translated into the Cherokee Language. Cherokee Syllabary only. ᎧᏃᎮᏗ Ꮎ ᎤᏍᏗ ᎠᎩᎦᎨ ᏥᏔᎦ ᎠᎩᏏ. ᏂᎦᏓ ᏣᎳᎩ ᎦᎣᎯᏍᏗ. ᎥᏝ ᎩᎵᏏ ᏱᎩ. Suitable for young native readers and students of the language.
subjects: Foreign Language Study, Native American Languages
title: Na Usdi Agigage Jitaga Agisi - The Little Red Hen
